list.name: SUPER-TOTEM
list.description: Bo places a totem that increases allies' Super charging rate by x%. The totem slowly loses its health over time.
list.descriptionHtml: Bo places a totem that increases allies' Super charging rate by x%. The totem slowly loses its health over time.

list.name: TRIPWIRE
list.description: Bo triggers all of his mines after x seconds. During the delay the mines are completely undetectable to opponents.
list.descriptionHtml: Bo triggers all of his mines after x seconds. During the delay the mines are completely undetectable to opponents.
